input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add a signature in adobe reader?
input_text.Response A: Sure, you can sign a document in Adobe Reader by clicking the Sign button in the Document menu, and then following the steps to add your signature.  This will create a new signature in the document, which you can then save and use to sign other documents.  You can also add a signature in Adobe Reader by selecting the Create Signature button in the Signature menu, and then signing the document using your digital signature.  You can also sign a document in Adobe Reader by selecting the Add Signature button in the Tools menu, and then adding your signature using the tool.
input_text.Response B:
Open the document in which you need to place the signature.
After all a window appears asking how to place the signature.

label_annotations.feedback: Both were good but A was more detailed
